data.eml:eml: New data on recently described Chilean trophonines (Gastropoda: Muricidae), description of a new species and notes of their occurrence at a cold seep site

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Houart, Roland, Sellanes, Javier (2006): New data on recently described Chilean trophonines (Gastropoda: Muricidae), description of a new species and notes of their occurrence at a cold seep site. Zootaxa 1222: 53-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273425
